title: EAN Validator - Check & Calculate EAN-13/EAN-8 Check Digits

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Let the 12 digits be $d_1, d_2, \dots, d_{12}$. Weights: $w_1=1, w_2=3, w_3=1, \dots, w_{12}=3$. Sum $S = \sum_{i=1}^{12} (d_i \times w_i)$ Check Digit $C = (10 - (S \pmod{10})) \pmod{10}$

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Let the 7 digits be $d_1, d_2, \dots, d_7$. Weights: $w_1=3, w_2=1, w_3=3, \dots, w_7=3$. Sum $S = \sum_{i=1}^{7} (d_i \times w_i)$ Check Digit $C = (10 - (S \pmod{10})) \pmod{10}$

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
